pages.text: Whenever you enter a new world, you go about the mindless, days-long task of gathering villagers around you, turning them into zombies and healing them again, only for one of them to eventually hand you a book of Mending. All this, just so you don't have to fix your tools.$(br)That's both less exciting and species-appropriate. Now that you can process Bedrock, you have a much more convenient solution, anyways.
The Bedrock Pickaxe comes with $(bold)Silk Touch$().
The Bedrock Axe comes with $(bold)Efficiency VI$().
The Bedrock Shovel comes with $(bold)Efficiency VI$().
The Bedrock Sword comes with $(bold)Sharpness VI$().
The Bedrock Hoe comes with $(bold)Fortune IV$().
The Bedrock Bow comes with $(bold)Power VI$().
The Bedrock Crossbow comes with $(bold)Quick Charge IV$().
The Bedrock Shears come with $(bold)Silk Touch$().
The Bedrock Fishing Rod comes with $(bold)Luck of the Sea IV$().
